pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhūnaṁ anekapariyāyena vinayakathaṁ katheti, vinayassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, ādissa ādissa āyasmato upālissa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.4: “bhagavā kho anekapariyāyena vinayakathaṁ katheti, vinayassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, vinayapariyattiyā vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati, ādissa ādissa āyasmato upālissa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.5: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṁ pariyāpuṇāmā”ti, te ca bahū bhikkhū therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṁ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.7: “etarahi kho, āvuso, bahū bhikkhū therā ca navā ca majjhimā ca āyasmato upālissa santike vinayaṁ pariyāpuṇanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.8: Sace ime vinaye pakataññuno bhavissanti amhe yenicchakaṁ yadicchakaṁ yāvadicchakaṁ ākaḍḍhissanti parikaḍḍhissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.10: Atha kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadanti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.11: “kiṁ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṁvattantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.12: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.17: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, vinayaṁ vivaṇṇessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.19: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:1.20.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṁ vadeyya—‘kiṁ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṁvattantī’ti, sikkhāpadavivaṇṇake pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.1.6: uddisante vā uddisāpente vā sajjhāyaṁ vā karonte.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.1.8: “kiṁ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṁvattantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.1.9: “Ye imaṁ pariyāpuṇanti tesaṁ kukkuccaṁ hoti, vihesā hoti, vilekhā hoti, ye imaṁ na pariyāpuṇanti tesaṁ kukkuccaṁ na hoti vihesā na hoti vilekhā na hoti. Anuddiṭṭhaṁ idaṁ varaṁ, anuggahitaṁ idaṁ varaṁ, apariyāpuṭaṁ idaṁ varaṁ, adhāritaṁ idaṁ varaṁ, vinayo vā antaradhāyatu, ime vā bhikkhū appakataññuno hontū”ti upasampannassa vinayaṁ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī vinayaṁ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.2: Upasampanne vematiko vinayaṁ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī vinayaṁ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.2.5: Anupasampannassa vinayaṁ vā aññaṁ vā dhammaṁ vivaṇṇeti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc72:2.3.2: na vivaṇṇetukāmo, “iṅgha tvaṁ suttante vā gāthāyo vā abhidhammaṁ vā pariyāpuṇassu, pacchā vinayaṁ pariyāpuṇissasī”ti bhaṇati,
